very poor.heading: very poor
very poor.description: There is a high probability of your loan and credit card applications getting rejected. In case of approval, you are unlikely to get the lowest interest rate.

poor.heading: poor
poor.description: You will have a slightly higher chance of getting approved for loans. However, the interest rates offered may be on the higher side.

average.heading: average
average.description: You are quite likely to get approved for financial products and a large number of lenders will consider offering you a loan or credit card.

good.heading: good
good.description: You might get better than the average interest rate on your loans and most lenders will be willing to offer you loans basis your credit score.

excellent.heading: excellent
excellent.description: With score categorised as excellent, you will get the best possible loan interest rate and will also receive top credit card offers from the lenders.
